about_the_game:
The soundtrack of the game 8-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle.

Genre: Soundtrack
Tempo: Fast
Mood: Intense, Driving

Once downloaded, MP3 files can be found in the 8-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle Steam directory.
...\Steam\SteamApps\common\8-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle\Soundtrack

Track listing:
1. Quirky Jerk (1:10)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: intel Core 2 Dual
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.5 or later
  • Processor: intel Core 2 Dual
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • Sound Card: Any
